definition: Juan Antonio Samaranch (1920-), Spanish Olympic official, president of International Olympic Committee 1980-2001
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Yeah, but I still feel sad.Goodbye, Samaranch.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，但是我還是很傷心，再見了，薩馬蘭奇。

sentences.english: Prefaced by the President of the International Olympic Committee Samaranch.
sentences.chinese: 本書由國際奧委會主席薩馬蘭奇作序。

sentences.english: Lily: Yeah, but I still feel sad. Goodbye, Samaranch.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，但是我還是很傷心，再見了，薩馬蘭奇。
